    module ApplicationHelper

    Public Instance Methods

    api_user_url(api_user_id) click to toggle source

    This is needed everywhere except inside the Auth service to render creator and updater links correctly.

    # File lib/generators/ocean_setup/templates/application_helper.rb, line 22
def api_user_url(api_user_id)
  "#{OCEAN_API_URL}/#{Api.version_for :api_user}/api_users/#{api_user_id || 0}"
end
    hyperlinks(links={}) click to toggle source

    Used in Jbuilder templates to build hyperlinks

    # File lib/generators/ocean_setup/templates/application_helper.rb, line 6
def hyperlinks(links={})
  result = {}
  links.each do |qi, val|
    result[qi.to_s] = { 
               "href" => val.kind_of?(String) ? val : val[:href], 
               "type" => val.kind_of?(String) ? "application/json" : val[:type]
            }
  end
  result
end
